meanings.definition: Surgical removal of a lobe of an organ, especially the brain or lung.
meanings.sent1: The lobectomy successfully removed the damaged part of the lung.
meanings.sent2: The doctor performed a lobectomy to remove the affected brain lobe.
meanings.sent3: During the lobectomy, the surgeon found a tiny toy car in the lung lobe!
meanings.sent4: Her lobectomy was like pruning a tree, removing the unhealthy branch.
meanings.sent5: The lobectomy was a life-saving procedure, like cutting out a cancerous section.
